title: Canillary E change
body:
At the moment, the E has a huge range and a stun added to it, so i thought of a change that might be able to tone it down

1. Make it the first champ hit stun, not AOE, I shouldn't be able to stun a group of targets that easily
2. Attack speed bonus should go down to 70% at rank 5, and 2.5-5 seconds duration that scale as you level it
3. Remove the damage part, and add a bit more to the single target stun, it's a grapple and shouldn't be doing damage

replies.body: Get over it they putting a hotfix in as an aoe .25-.5 sec knockup instead of stun, unless the decide to go back on that anyway
Who the hell are you talking about? Camille?
